title: 328 Must Jesus Bear The Cross Alone

lines: 1. Must Jesus bear the cross alone, And all the world go free? No, there's a cross for every one, And there's a cross for me.
2. The consecrated cross I'll bear, Till He shall set me free; And then go home my crown to wear, For there's a crown for me.
3. Upon the crystal pavement, down At Jesusâ€™ pierced feet, With joy I'll cast my golden crown, And His dear name repeat.
